project.title: CMS Migration
project.role: Project Manager and Web Content Manager
project.description: Migrating content while ensuring minimal downtime and maintaining data integrity.
project.challenges: Migrating content while ensuring minimal downtime and maintaining data integrity.
project.solutions: Implemented a phased migration plan, conducted thorough testing, and coordinated closely with IT teams.
project.results: Successfully migrated 500+ pages with 0% data loss, improved site performance by 20%.
